title: karudiDuvAi manamE
sahitya:
karudiDuvAi manamE gati peravE dinamum marudamalai mEvum varadan tirunAmam


anupallavi

  urudiyAi ivvulagil uidu nalam eidiDa uLLam unadil bhakti veLLamenavE peruga


caraNam    kaTTukk-aDangAmalE eTTu dikkilumE muTTit-tirindODi mOdum un pazhakkattai 
viTTu nI iniyEnum keTTu azhivurAmal vIra vaDivElan tAraka tirunAmam
